name: Mr Octopus
description:
You are an Octopus working hard in his office trying to get a raise. Jerry your coworker wants that raise for himself though. To decide who gets it, you must 3d print warriors to fight to the death.

Use W and S to move the camera back and forth.

There is a problem where the Two Handed Swordsman spawn out of the office but  I ran out of time to fix it. They find their way in so it's ok.

There is a win and loss condition when a base is destroyed. I just forgot to add health bars to the bases to show that you are dealing damage
